events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, focused on the Software Engineer role.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will be reaching out soon.
The initial screening interview went well, and we are pleased with your technical background and experience.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the next steps in the interview process.
We have scheduled your technical interview with the engineering team for next Wednesday at 2 PM.
Your technical interview was completed successfully with positive feedback from all panel members.
We have arranged an HR interview for you on Friday at 10 AM to discuss the role and company culture further.
The HR interview concluded successfully, and we are very impressed with your communication and fit for the team.
We are excited to extend a formal offer for the Software Engineer position with our company.
Thank you for your positive feedback and interest in accepting our offer to join the engineering team.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we look forward to having you onboard as part of the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun, including setup of all software development tools and access to internal resources.
The hiring process is now complete, and you are fully integrated as a new Software Engineer on the team.
